dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3872 IH: State Transportation and Infrastructure Financing Innovation Act (STIFIA)
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Hanna (for himself and Ms. Hahn) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to reauthorize the State infrastructure bank program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the State Transportation and Infrastructure Financing Innovation Act (STIFIA).
Section 610 of title 23, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking subparagraph (A) and inserting the following:
15 percent of the funds apportioned to the State for each of fiscal years 2013 and 2014 under each of sections 104(b)(1) and 104(b)(2); and
in paragraph (2), by striking 2005 through 2009 and inserting 2013 and 2014;
in paragraph (3), by striking 2005 through 2009 and inserting 2013 and 2014; and
in paragraph (5), by striking section 133(d)(3) and inserting section 133(d)(4); and

paragraph.text: in subsection (k), by striking 2005 through 2009 and inserting 2013 and 2014.
